name: Doll play VR
description:
VR dollhouse tower defense. 

Defend your house against zombies in a race against the clock. Survive till 9 for the authorities to come to save you!

In progress, so with a lot of bugs atm, but am working on making it work :D

  • Team Name: Flipendo
  • Doll play
  • List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.

Solo developer: Dana van der Wal

Some info I didn't get around to putting in the game.

The character in the room where you place the object matters. Some characters are stronger, some can block longer and some can make distraction longer. Currently not very visible, but working on it.
